alert.note: Alert for Palm Beach (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 29 at 4:51PM EDT until May 29 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: The National Weather Service in Miami has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Palm Beach County in southeastern Florida... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 451 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Wellington, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wellington, Loxahatchee NWR, Kings Point, Aberdeen and Florida Gardens. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
